entities.name: BOARD OF DIRECTORS
entities.description: The governing body responsible for overseeing the policies and management of the corporation.

entities.name: DELAWARE CORPORATION
entities.description: A corporation that is incorporated in the state of Delaware and subject to Delaware General Corporation Law (DGCL).

entities.name: STOCKHOLDER
entities.description: An individual or entity that owns shares in a corporation.

entities.name: DIRECTORS
entities.description: Individuals who are members of the board of directors of the corporation.

entities.name: EXECUTIVE OFFICERS
entities.description: Senior members of management who are responsible for the day-to-day operations of the corporation.

entities.name: EMPLOYEE STOCK PLANS
entities.description: Plans that allow employees to own shares in the corporation, often with specific provisions for tender or exchange offers.

entities.name: INTERESTED STOCKHOLDER
entities.description: An entity or person beneficially owning 15% or more of the outstanding voting stock of the corporation and any entity or person affiliated with or controlling or controlled by such entity or person.

relationships.relationship_description: The board of directors oversees the policies and management of the Delaware corporation.
Directors are members of the board of directors of the Delaware corporation.
Executive officers are senior members of management responsible for day-to-day operations of the Delaware corporation.
Stockholders are individuals or entities that own shares in the Delaware corporation.
An interested stockholder is an entity or person beneficially owning 15% or more of the outstanding voting stock of the Delaware corporation.
Employee stock plans allow employees to own shares in the Delaware corporation, often with specific provisions for tender or exchange offers.
